full_summary:
# Website Maintenance Requirements

**Tender Reference Number:** cb-153-97488462
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** T8080-230275
**Publication Date:** November 27, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 7, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** January 2, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** December 31, 2025

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Commodity/Service Category:** SRV - Software and IT Services
**Client:** Transport Canada
**Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Description of Requirement:**
Transport Canada requires the upgrade and maintenance of its website. The work involves upgrading the Intranet and Internet Drupal instances to version 10 using the latest Web Experience Toolkit (WxT) that is mobile-friendly, meets accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 AA), and includes the implementation of new features and enhancements. 

The scope of work includes:

* Upgrading Drupal instances to version 10 using the latest WxT available
* Implementing new features and enhancements
* Providing on-demand support between 8:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m., Monday to Friday, for a maximum of 72 days
* Performing requested enhancements once submitted time estimates are approved by Transport Canada Web Services

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Bidders must submit one bid for the resource category. The evaluation criteria include the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Posting Details:**
* Posting Type: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Posting Type Reason: None
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries, please contact:
Barbara Gorman
Transport Canada
(343) 550-2175
barbara.gorman@tc.gc.ca

**Notice and Attachments:**
Please refer to the attached notice and tender document.

Please follow the above format for your response. Make sure to rephrase the text to seem more professional and concise. Only include relevant information. 

Do not exceed the 400-word count. 

Let me know if this meets your requirements or if there is anything else I can do for you.  Let me know if I would be able to assist you with rephrasing any more government
